body:
> Is this issue supposed to be fixed now? I can see that it was closed due to a pull request.
> 
> After being stuck on 10.0.5 because of this bug, I wanted to update to 10.1.2 today since I saw the pull-request merged and ticket closed.
> But as soon as I update I get an error when trying to build:
> 
> ```
> Error: Cannot find module 'webpack/lib/node/NodeTemplatePlugin'
> Require stack:
> - /Users/maekeler/projects/makaira/storefront/node_modules/mini-css-extract-plugin/dist/loader.js
> - /Users/maekeler/projects/makaira/storefront/node_modules/next/dist/compiled/webpack/bundle4.js
> - /Users/maekeler/projects/makaira/storefront/node_modules/next/dist/compiled/webpack/webpack.js
> - /Users/maekeler/projects/makaira/storefront/node_modules/next/dist/next-server/server/config-utils.js
> - /Users/maekeler/projects/makaira/storefront/node_modules/next/dist/next-server/server/config.js
> - /Users/maekeler/projects/makaira/storefront/node_modules/next/dist/build/index.js
> - /Users/maekeler/projects/makaira/storefront/node_modules/next/dist/cli/next-build.js
> - /Users/maekeler/projects/makaira/storefront/node_modules/next/dist/bin/next
> ```
> 
> The related ticket is marked as a duplicate of this one: #21721

same errors occur when i want to customize less config
